attributes.additional_details: do you know that the crown copyright owns your name MR/MRS/MISS they are all fictional titles NOT TO BE USED AS IDENTITY as its says on your birth certificate you as a human MAN/WOMAN are subject to common law a PERSON/BIRTH CERTIFICATE is subject to ACTS/STATUTES acts and statutes ARE NOT LAW unless given the force of law by the governed. this e-petition is for the right under common law to not be governed (ie) pay tax ect
